meanings.definition: The actions or behavior of a clown.
meanings.sent1: The clownery at the circus made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her clownery at the birthday party entertained the children.
meanings.sent3: The clownery in the park brought smiles to all who watched.
meanings.sent4: His clownery on stage was a colorful display of joy.
meanings.sent5: The clownery of the funny clown stayed in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: The profession or practice of being a clown.
meanings.sent1: She studied clownery to become a professional clown.
meanings.sent2: The art of clownery requires skill and creativity.
meanings.sent3: His dream was to join the circus and perform clownery.
meanings.sent4: Clownery is not just about jokes but also about spreading happiness.
meanings.sent5: The world of clownery is full of laughter and fun.
